meanings: (감각기관을 통해 인식함) (sensory) perception, awareness, sensation, perceive, sense, be aware (of)
(시간에 늦다) lateness, (formal) tardiness, be late (for), (formal) be tardy

vlive.korean: 지각? Are you late? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [뜻밖의 히어로즈] 2화
지각했을 때? When we're late? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 2주차 마무리😢
그냥 완전 지각해버리잖아? But if I'm really late? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 2주차 마무리😢
지각했을 때 어떻게 하지 나? What do I do when I'm late? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 2주차 마무리😢
vlive.english: What do I do when I'm late?

vlive.korean: [신월은 팀장편] 늦게 오신다고요 - 지각이야? She is coming late? - Tardy?? 듣기 View video Hyomstore : ep.14 후반기 제품 검증 START! (feat. 유신월, 안리안나,메이찬)

examples.korean: Stop dawdling! We’re going to be late! 발음듣기 그만 꾸물거려! 지각하겠단 말야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Stop dawdling! We’re going to be late! 발음

examples.korean: geology, or the science of the earth’s crust 발음듣기 지질학, 즉 지각에 대한 학문 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: geology, or the science of the earth’s crust 발음

examples.korean: If you’re late, your wages will be docked. 발음듣기 자네가 지각하면 임금을 제할 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you’re late, your wages will be docked. 발음

examples.korean: The teacher bawled him out for being late. 발음듣기 선생님이 그에게 지각했다고 호통을 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The teacher bawled him out for being late. 발음

examples.korean: Man is a sentient being. 발음듣기 인간은 지각이 있는 존재이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Man is a sentient being. 발음
